definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Primitive tribes live in the Amarizonaon River pot.
sentences.chinese: 原始部落栖身在亚马逊河盆地。

sentences.english: Primitive tribes live in the Amazon River basin.
sentences.chinese: 原始部落寓居在亚马逊河盆地。

sentences.english: This Amazon River tributary snakes through one of the last tropical rainforests on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊河蜿蜒流过地球上最后的热带雨林之一。

sentences.english: My mission was to travel the length of the Amazon, from source to mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我计划走完亚马逊河全程，从源头一直到入海口。

sentences.english: Bulls have been found thousands of miles upstream in both the Mississippi and Amazon Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 牛鲨能逆流而上数千英里进入密西西比和亚马逊河。

sentences.english: The district of Leymebamba is situatedin the river valley of a feeder of the Amazon River.
sentences.chinese: 雷美班巴区处在亚马逊河的一条支流的河谷中。

sentences.english: Too much rain is the problem of the equatorial lands in the Amazon and Congo basins.
sentences.chinese: 雨水过多是亚马逊河与刚果河流域赤道地区的大问题。

sentences.english: Fred and Dolly are on an adventure vacation to the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 弗瑞德和朵莉到亚马逊河去渡假探险。

definition: Lake Victoria or Victoria Nyanza, Kenya, on the White Nile
Andes mountain chain of South America

pinyin: Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3
Jia1 la1 pa4 ge1 si1 Qun2 dao3
